pages.text: Loyal and aggressive, these bears make for fine servants to claw and rip apart your enemies. Also makes for a good mount, no saddle needed in fact, if you ignore its slow speed.
One can call upon a loyal bear through the use of a $(l:focuses/wild/mauling_focus)Mauling Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
Right-clicking on a loyal Bear Servant with fish will heal them. Summoning a bear servant on a cold biome or with a $(l:crafts/frost_staff)Frost Staff$() will call forth a Polar Bear Servant.
